title: InvalidDepositEventsException on restart
body:
Getting the exception below on restart across a number of boxes including seen locally once.

First problem is that it's only being logged at debug level and should be a big clear error message on the console.

Second problem is it doesn't resolve and we lose track of eth1 and start voting poorly.  Restarting (possibly after enough time passes) solves the issue.

We seem to be calculating the first block to request incorrectly after startup.


Actually it's possible this isn't triggered by a restart - can't be sure.
